review: I was using the HDMI extender that comes with it, and it was plugged into the back of my tv literally about 12 inches away from my router. It kept dropping the network. It would stream video from any app for more than 1 minute before it would drop the network. I looked around online for possible solutions and found a lot of people had the same issue. Couldn't figure it out, everything I tried didn't help. Amazon themselves said that this has been a problem. Looks like I'm going with Roku.
